title: The One About Grudges
description:
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
This week, Bob and Monét talk about holding grudges, making amends, and what would happen if Colleen (Monét's cat) were to 'fall off a balcony' on Bob's watch.
Follow Bob: @BobTheDragQueen
Follow Monet: @MonetXChange

To watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/SiblingRivalryPodYT


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/SiblingRivalryPodcast


If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: https://bit.ly/SiblingRivalryPodcast



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!

This week, Bob and Monét talk about holding grudges, making amends, and what would happen if Colleen (Monét's cat) were to 'fall off a balcony' on Bob's watch.

Follow Bob: @BobTheDragQueen

Follow Monet: @MonetXChange
